channel.title: linux on Fahim Salam Chowdhury
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Fahim Salam Chowdhury

item.title: My linux gestures
item.description: Around 2 years ago, I switched to macos as my primary operating system, to check what’s the hype. I found out the os is solid, but can’t find anything espcical which I can’t replicate in any linux os. Couple of months ago, I switched back to linux as my mac machine bites to dust. Nothing much bothers me this time, because in 2 years I tried to use cross-platform (& open sourced) apps as much possible.
